articles.title: Mammoths and North American horses vanished later than previously thought: researchers - CBC.ca
articles.description: Mammoths didn’t die out until about 6,000 years ago — more recently than previously believed — as did the wild horses that once grazed the plains of North America, according to new findings out of McMaster University.
articles.content: Mammoths may not have disappeared until about 6,000 years ago more recently than previously believed as did the wild horses that once grazed the plains of North America, according to new findings out… [+3462 chars]

articles.title: A new poll finds major warning signs for Biden and fellow Democrats - NPR
articles.description: The NPR/Marist survey has President Biden with a 42% approval rating. Americans also don't feel the direct payments or expanded child tax credits Democrats doled out helped them much.
articles.content: President Biden traveled to Kansas City, Mo., Wednesday to talk about how the newly signed infrastructure law will boost the community. As Biden sells his agenda, a new NPR/Marist poll finds his appr… [+7460 chars]

articles.title: Study reveals trends in binge drinking among older U.S. men and women - News-Medical.Net
articles.description: Binge drinking has increased in recent years among older U.S. men but not among older women, according to a study published in the Journal of the American Geriatrics Society.
articles.content:
Binge drinking has increased in recent years among older U.S. men but not among older women, according to a study published in the Journal of the American Geriatrics Society.

articles.title: Nick Cannon's 5-month-old son, Zen, has died of brain cancer - CBC News
articles.description: American entertainer Nick Cannon announced his son's tragic death during a taping of The Nick Cannon Show on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Nick Cannon's five-month-old son Zen has died from brain cancer.
